Record your screen and camera with one click and easily create a MP4 video to share. CVR is the ONLY free recording extension with UNLIMITED recording and SHARING. (Don't be tricked by other software that limited your recording and sharing unless you pay $$.) 

Professional recording, editing and sharing features without any of the costs. Recording, camera overlay, on-screen annotation and editing all free. Plus cloud sharing making it easy to move recordings anywhere you need them - even large recordings. Others charge or do sneaky tactics like adding a watermark over the image unless you pay. No watermarks with CVR just recording goodness.

CVR has zero subscription fee. You don't even need to create an account!
